Symptoms: High internal temperature, food is not preserved.
Solutions: Check the compressor and replace the thermostat.

Symptoms: Excess ice on the walls of the freezer.
Possible Causes: Issue with the fan or automatic defrost.
Solutions: Clean the fan and check the defrost system.

Error Description: The interior light is not turning on.
Symptoms: Refrigerator interior is dark when the door is opened.
Possible Causes: Faulty light bulb or door switch.
Solutions: Replace the bulb or adjust the switch.
Adjust the compressor or replace faulty components.

Error Description: Water leaks at the base of the refrigerator.
Symptoms: Water on the floor near the refrigerator.
Possible Causes: Blocked drain or overflowing drip tray.
Solutions: Unclog the drain and clean the drip tray.

Error Description: The refrigerator door does not close properly.
Symptoms: Door stays slightly open, affecting temperature maintenance.
Solutions: Replace the door gasket or realign the door.

Symptoms: No water coming out of the dispenser.
Possible Causes: Clogged water filter or frozen water line.
Solutions: Check and replace the water filter or thaw the water line.

Symptoms: No ice is formed even when the ice maker is on.
Possible Causes: Faulty ice maker module or clogged water line.
Solutions: Replace the ice maker module or unclog the water line.

Symptoms: Temperature is not stable, leading to spoiled food.
Solutions: Replace the thermostat or check the sensor connections.

Symptoms: Refrigerator runs non-stop, consuming more energy.
Possible Causes: Faulty thermostat or damaged defrost timer.
Solutions: Replace the thermostat or defrost timer.

Symptoms: Warm air entering the fridge, reduced cooling efficiency.
Solutions: Replace or realign the door seal.

Symptoms: No water dispensing even when activated.
Possible Causes: Clogged water filter or frozen water line.
Solutions: Replace the water filter or thaw the frozen water line.

Symptoms: No ice is formed, or ice maker is not filling with water.
Possible Causes: Faulty ice maker module or blocked water supply.
Solutions: Replace the ice maker module or clear the water supply line.
